rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0001
rows.name: ...Metsu is close. I can sense him.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0002
rows.name: So this is it then. The final battle.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0003
rows.name:
What shall we do? We may never
get another chance like this.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0004
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0005
rows.name: Proceed to the final battle?

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0006
rows.name: Proceed

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0007
rows.name: Not yet...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0008
rows.name:
All right then. I, too, think it is time
for us to make a stand.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0009
rows.name:
Think only of the battle, Majesty.
Kagutsuchi and I are here to protect
you.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0010
rows.name:
Indeed, we, the Jewels of Superbia,
are sworn to serve you, for now and
for ever.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi/Wadatsumi
I trust you with my life

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0012
rows.name:
I will write of this battle in my journal.
It will be a story for the ages.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0013
rows.name:
Yeah, with the power we command,
there is absolutely no way we can lose.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0014
rows.name:
Who needs modesty, eh, Grail?
Though I suppose you of all people
probably don't, come to think of it...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0015
rows.name:
Metsu and I may be evenly matched,
but with all of you by my side, it tips
the balance.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0016
rows.name:
He's got no one but himself to rely on.
And that's why he's going down.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0017
rows.name: Hikari... You've really changed.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0018
rows.name:
Oh...y-you think? Wonder who's to
blame for that. You Drivers must really
rub off on people...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0019
rows.name:
It's not just that. Hell, if that were
the case, I'd be some kind of street
preacher by now.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0020
rows.name:
When you put it that way, I can't help
feeling just the slightest twinge of pity
for our dear Deacon.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0021
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but I must sympathize with
Minochi. I couldn't imagine having to be
the Blade of such a horrid man..

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0022
rows.name:
It's true. The rest of us are lucky to
have such caring Drivers..like Laura.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0023
rows.name:
I'll have you know, we're just as lucky
to have such loyal companions by our
side, Shin

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0024
rows.name: I couldn't have put it better.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0025
rows.name: Thank you, Shin.. Thank you, everyone...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0026
rows.name:
Right! Let's knock Metsu off his high
horse and then get ourselves out of
here, back to the boys!

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0027
rows.name: Indeed, you are wise to be cautious.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0028
rows.name:
Agreed. This is a battle we simply can't
lose. If we're going to confront Metsu,
we need to be at peak performance.
